channel.title: r00t info
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "r00t info"

item.title: Re: r00t info
item.content:encoded:
There is such a page already. Although the Virus Attacks are related to the Field itself I believe it is related to the Difficulty and to the Message inside the Field <- link(you can find this in the Village menu).

There is more on this on the disscusion page of that link.

item.title: Re: r00t info
item.content:encoded: From my observations, there is a minimum difficulty which the field must have for certain virii to spawn (you'll not see Tinfoil Microwaves in Simple Training Aqua Field, for example). Difficulty varies daily but stays in a smallish range (so far, no more than + or - 3). People should track this collectively if possible FOR SCIENCE and all that. Difficulty of the field and its weather conditions (yes, this can change daily!) doesn't seem to alter core rewards or difficulty.

item.title: Re: r00t info
item.content:encoded: Even so, an enemy database might still be useful. Unfortunately while I have good, or at least adequate for the task, wiki skills I'm not in r00t. So I don't know anything about the virii except what's been posted on the boards.

item.title: Re: r00t info
item.content:encoded:
REMEMBER THE FIELDS CHANGES FROM TIME TO TIME…… i encoutered that virus every where……

from dimly lit crumbling aqua to simple training aqua

item.title: r00t info
item.content:encoded:
I admit - I have little wiki-fu. But I have good data collection skills. Would someone who has good wiki-fu start a template for recording virii inside the fields? I have 5 or 6 varieties so far, and will add them to a virus page if someone can make a template.

The easiest virus so far I encountered (Simple Training Aqua Field) is the Typical Badguy, a Gen 15d/15s worth 25 Core.
